title: What I Know For Sure: Authentic Power
description: Oprah shares excerpts from her New York Times Best-Selling book, What I Know For Sure. Inspired by her widely popular O, The Oprah Magazine's column, the compilation book includes Oprah's insight on how to become your best self. Oprah reflects on the moments that shaped her life. From meeting Reverend Jesse Jackson as a child to a lesson her father taught her at a young age, Oprah shares how authentic power comes when you're fulfilling your soul’s intention.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
